Is McCain going to throw in the towel on Pennsylvania like he did in Michigan. New voter registration figures in Pennsylvania show that Democratic registration grew while Republican registration shrank. How does McCain expect to win with a million plus Republican voter deficit? Source: Truly Newsworthy.
 
 McCain will have to redirect his resources to North Carolina and Virginia if he wants any shot at winning.

Is McCain going to throw in the towel on Pennsylvania like he did in Michigan.  So, do you spend all of your days as an Obama shill? You have two posts, both anti-McCain. I hope Obama pays well. emoticon_rolleyes

So because I am new to this forum I just wanted to defend myself and my right to add posts and threads. Unfortunately I am not getting paid by Obama, but surprisingly, that may just be because I do not work for his campaign, nor will I ever. I have simply posted stories that I find interesting and relevant. It so happens that Obama may seem the benefactor of my posts, but that's more a reflection on McCain's actions than anything else. I hope you do not take my future posts too personally, as they are not meant to offend anyone.
